alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 8:51AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM PEAKS TODAY-TONIGHT BUT CONTINUES INTO TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations mainly between 3 and 5 inches, the majority falling today and tonight. Northwest winds gusting 25 to 35 MPH today, but decreasing to only 15 to 25 MPH tonight into Tuesday. * WHERE...Clay, Fillmore, and Nuckolls Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact Christmas and post-Christmas travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will frequently reduce visibility to under 1 mile, with near-blizzard conditions possible at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
